# Samet Özkale — AI Product & Design Manager

Samet Özkale is a product designer and entrepreneur with 9+ years of experience building AI agents, SaaS products, and leading cross-functional teams.

## Projects and Experience

### Mues AI
[link_1](https://mues.ai/): Developed the first agentic AI cursor for human software interaction, leading product strategy and design. This technology transforms user interaction with software applications and includes the creation of domain-specific AI agents capable of performing complex user actions.  
**Duration:** Jan 2025 – Oct 2025

### Roadmape
[link_6](https://www.samet.works/roadmape): Co-founder and Product & Design Lead for Roadmape, a product roadmapping software. Transitioned from Producter to Roadmape, focusing on designing intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences for complex product management workflows.  
**Duration:** Sep 2023 – Sep 2024

### Producter
[link_7](https://www.samet.works/producter): Co-founder and Product & Design Lead for Producter, a product management software. Designed and implemented features for feedback collection, task management, product updates, documentation, and roadmap management. Achieved over 3500 users from 18 different time zones, won Best UI/UX Design and Rising Star Awards, and raised a $350,000 pre-seed round.  
**Duration:** Jan 2022 – Sep 2023

### Heybooster
[link_8](https://www.samet.works/heybooster): Served as Product & Design Advisor for Heybooster, an eCommerce analysis platform. Provided strategic product and design guidance to enhance user experience and drive product growth. Collaborated with stakeholders to align design solutions with business objectives, mentored design and product teams, and contributed to the overall product vision.  
**Duration:** May 2024 – Jan 2025
